phrases: So we need your songs to
If that is the situation, I will head there now.
Will you be okay, too, Cou-sama?
We will head up into the sky right away!
We will come get you now.
There is no time, so let us meet in the sky.
Let us meet up with the princesses and head back to the sky.
I have got a bad feeling somehow.
I am sorry I could not do more.
They must be pretty good to do
this much to Sharl and the chief.
It had human form, but that was not human.
It was a type of demon.
Demons who took the form of
humans existed in the distant past.
They were highly intelligent, wielding power that
was a manifestation of greed and disaster.
That must be the Disciple of Illness.
We need to save Aria, after all.
I hear the sound this way.
The presence is getting stronger, too.
They are just sharing the Disciple's voice.
We have something we have to do.
You are the one I can least forgive!
If you want to talk, let us talk.
I do not have even know what the heck's going on!
Can we calm down and talk?
I can hear a sound that sounds like his main body.
I think I can follow it.
Vert and the others take Gaul to the main body!
I will let you guys handle it!
I will give you back your voice.
You have gotten used to this form now, have not you?
I am used to it now.
And you are with Verde again?
He is strange for a sky person.
He is always nice to me.
Were you watching the surface again?
The heroes and the princesses are so cool.
And there is a wonderful prince, is not there?
I like to think about what I would do
if I went to the surface.
You can have the same form as a surface person.
Could not you go if you wanted?
I cannot get far from water, just like you guys.
And this year I was chosen to be the songstress.
For the Priestess and the Star Whale's sake, as well.
My life in the village is so peaceful and quiet,
but it is just a little boring.
My love for the surface is just a dream.
I will make your dream come true.
Let us go to the surface and keep it a secret from everyone.
It would be wonderful if I could go with you.
I know where the power to
Now I can make her dream come true.
The Star Whale that locks Aria away...
The village and priestess that hold her back...
I can make them all go to sleep.
We would go to the surface in secret.
No... this is not what I wanted.
I will protect your songs and voice.
You are trying to stop me?
Find me... and stay by me.
My guards are famous for appearing and
disappearing when you least expect it.
They can chase and run faster than anybody.
Just like I thought, you are just a kid.
Do not think you can get by in the world...
Just by being a selfish brat!
I do not know the reason,
but you cannot handle him anymore.
I guess that is a really troublesome type of demon.
If I go back, he will do what I say.
Our boss would not let that happen,
nor would any of our friends.
Our biggest goal is to save the Star Whale
and all the Star People, including you.
But I am also training to be a specialist
Even if he is a Disciple, if he can be saved, I want to save him.
What we need is not sacrifice and dedication,
it is information and a plan!
Would you tell us the details?
What happened between you and him?
Aria said she wanted to go to the surface.
I am going to make that dream come true!
You do not have to do this; we will take her!
If you promise not to be bad, we will take you, too!
The people of the surface refuse to accept us.
they tried to exterminate us, even though we did not do anything wrong.
I will not believe in the star people
or the humans of the surface.
I will make them all sleep with my power,
and make a peaceful and gentle world.
Aria can go to the surface to play in peace.
She will let me be the only one to hear her songs.
the situation's worse than we imagined.
We will just have to cut open a path.
Princess, I am going to up our speed!
The songstress from the surface is here, is not she?
Everybody, get the dais for the Star Festival ready!
Your wings may be the key to saving everyone.
Show the dragon priestess Sharl and everyone else
I am sorry princess, to ask you to sing in all this chaos.
I will sing anywhere, at any time.
Especially if it can help keep the Sky Sea safe.
There is nothing that would make me happier as a singer.
I am glad you are safe.
The star festival will be ready soon.
There is no end to them!
Let us sing a song of healing to the Star Whale, too!
